history.text: Hi! Do you think Bruce Almighty would be a good movie to watch?
Hello Friend how are you
Good, how are you
it seems interesting this actor is pretty good
48% on rotten tomatoes isn't a bad score
the cast of the film is great, only with morgan is enough to want to see it
Jennifer Aniston alone would make me want to see the movie
that girl is the best, but to put a comedian as a god, must be delirious
it seems like a perfect fit for slapstick humor!
Yes, Jim Carrey is quite a clown, it seems that this style still works
the one that I do not like very much is Bruce Nolan, there is not something that does not fit with that being
Well Bruce Nolan is Jim Carrey!
Jim Carrey is the actor playing Bruce Nolan.
But I bet Bruce Nolan was upset when Evan Baxter got the job he wanted.
I'm sorry, I meant Steve Carell
Ok that makes sense now
I'm sorry, I meant Steve Carell, el que hace de Evan Baxter
It must have been difficult for Bruce to answer all those prayers.
good for Bruce everything was superficial, he was focused on everything he deserved and not on what he should do
I agree, it seems as though he lost track of the bigger picture
It was very selfish to only respond to messages automatically without taking the time to read them
the part where he fights with the abusers is excellent, how he handles it, and the little monkey was very rude
Absolutely, he did not even listen to the concerns and dreams of those people.
If he did not even take into account his girlfriend's prayers, he was very selfish, at that moment
I do not understand what part you are referring to regarding the monkey and abusers
Yeah, his girlfriend really wanted to get engaged. But, they did at the end!
When he meets the abusers again, he makes a monkey out of the back of one of the boys
I don't recall reading that.
when he discovers, finally, what he must do, the man returns to be, a happy, relaxed guy, only that he had to recognize that more than he does not have an account
that he owns, more than he realizes
Yes, he definitely seems to realize his priorities at the end.
Trying to discover your priorities seems to be something really frustrating in some people?
especially if you do not realize how much you have, if not how much you want.
If you have the opportunity to see it, it seems to be a very good movie
Priorities, I would argue, are one of the most important things one needs to figure out in life to be truly happy.
Yes, I should watch it.
